<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rallying Cry](/Feats.aspx?ID=5588) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=541" />
<trait label="Hobgoblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=757" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 15 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Frequency**
once per day

</column>

---

You call out to your allies and push them to give their all in combat. All allies in a 30-foot emanation that can hear you gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level. In addition, these allies become [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=89) for 1 minute but can use the extra action only to Step, Stride, or Strike.
name: Rallying Cry
